title: Cantsay
author: Cantsay
created_time: July 28, 2022, 10:57:49 PMLast edit: July 29, 2022, 12:36:45 PM by Cantsay
content: Requesting mod/ admin to do more investigation and take appropriate action. Accounts connected and cheating in multiple bounties Mam009sakib0175Proof:Quote from: Mam009 on July 24, 2022, 09:42:26 AMTelegram username: @alice3212Quote from: sakib0175 on October 14, 2021, 07:05:10 PMTelegram Username: @alice3212Quote from: sakib0175 on November 04, 2021, 02:27:58 PMTelegram Username : @farhan4231Quote from: Mam009 on June 30, 2022, 04:01:07 AMTelegram User Name: @farhan4231Archived |  Archived  |  Archived  |  Archived According to Block  Scan you can see that some transactions were made by 0x97Cf0a52e4ED87C53013E4DF3d63e2a84a5f4f54 which is owned by Sakib0175 and 0x0ed1F6dF5C1d4eB0669AFF61e9A597Db69925742 which is owned by Mam009Bscscan result Seven transactions were made from Mam009 to Sakib0175, while six transactions from Sakib0175 to  Mam009 wallet address.Bscscan link: https://bscscan.com/txs?a=0x0ed1F6dF5C1d4eB0669AFF61e9A597Db69925742 See image here: https://imgur.com/a/VdJWgMe  Ether Scan Result One transaction was made from Sakib0175 to  Mam009 Etherscan link: https://etherscan.io/address/0x0ed1F6dF5C1d4eB0669AFF61e9A597Db69925742See image here: https://imgur.com/a/8QLfUIZ  Polygon Scan Result One transaction from  Sakin0175 to  Mam009Polygonscan link: https://polygonscan.com/address/0x0ed1F6dF5C1d4eB0669AFF61e9A597Db69925742See image here: https://imgur.com/a/5X8s6si   my final observation  I also noticed a wallet address which might be their main wallet and several transactions were made from both  Sakib0175 and  Mam009 into the address.  0x5C2B1B50633C8bfa7FE3d936D4c8A4c770784a16Bscscan shows that nine transaction were made by  Sakib0175 while one transaction was made by  Mam009 in the address.  https://bscscan.com/address/0x5c2b1b50633c8bfa7fe3d936d4c8a4c770784a16See image here: https://imgur.com/a/CSoEj9p Etherscan shows that  Mam009 one transaction to the said address.https://etherscan.io/address/0x5c2b1b50633c8bfa7fe3d936d4c8a4c770784a16See image here: https://imgur.com/a/Y1UjYjw Polygonscan shows that both  Mam009  and  sakin0175 made one transaction each to the said address. https://polygonscan.com/address/0x5c2b1b50633c8bfa7fe3d936d4c8a4c770784a16See image here: https://imgur.com/a/WiCZQzS Both accounts have been participating in various bounties.Mar mission project  |Spreadsheet no  Twitter #20 & 83, Facebook #18 & #72 Telegram #9 & #68 | managed by Jawadu. Whisper MSG | Spreadsheet no  Twitter #284 & #294  Managed by Julerz12. Backed Finance | Spreadsheet no  Twitter #481 & #484 Managed by Julerz12 patron legendary dogs | Spreadsheet no:  Twitter #505 & #658, Telegram #350 & #464  Managed by OneNuts Sealam lab  | Spreadsheet no  Twitter #441 & #479, Telegram #249 & #266  Managed by Bounty Star Volare Network  | Spreadsheet no  Twitter #65 & #343 Managed by Julerz12 Crypto Pirate round 2  | Spreadsheet no  Twitter #479 & #763, Telegram #347 & #502 Managed by The Rise Nody.Ai  | Spreadsheet no  Twitter #1470 & #1473  Managed by Cryptopreneur Brainboss Lovely Swap  | Spreadsheet no  Twitter #260 & #133, Telegram #174 & #44  Managed by Bounty Detective.And other ongoing bounties.Quote I’m still investigating to see if would get more proof but for the time being these are the only proofs I haveQuoteI would appreciate if a higher rank member make a repost but this time adding the images to make it easier to understand.Quote from: Timelord2067 on April 14, 2022, 10:23:36 AMNo "Newbie" or, "Junior Member" can post an investigation in this thread.  They can however post a link (once) to a thread in the reputation section where their investigations can be investigated and analised.Just in case you're wondering why I had to start a new thread. I hope the quoted post answers you question.

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: Quote from: Cantsay on July 28, 2022, 10:57:49 PMRequesting mod/ admin to do more investigation and take appropriate action.Moderators/admin don't moderate scam. So, they will not investigate anymore. Maybe if the proof is solid which I haven’t looked yet, DT member will tag them accordingly. Also, if you think they are cheating, you can also neg tag them.

comments.author: Pandu Geddon
comments.body: @Cantsay, you can tag both accounts in red. your evidence is strong enough, there are transactions from both accounts, as well as the use of both telegram accounts.one more thing, you also have to tell the bounty manager, after that it's up to the manager to get rid of the two accounts or not.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Quote from: Pandu Geddon on July 29, 2022, 12:15:53 PMone more thing, you also have to tell the bounty manager, after that it's up to the manager to get rid of the two accounts or not.After sending the PM to the bounty managers I noticed some warning, is it because newbies ain't allowed to send pm?Quote!!! WARNING: This user is a newbie. If you are expecting a message from a more veteran member, then this is an imposter !!!

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: The evidence seems to be solid and verified. As a result, both accounts have been tagged for cheating on bounty campaigns. Nice investigation, @Cantsay!Quote from: Cantsay on July 29, 2022, 01:05:24 PMAfter sending the PM to the bounty managers I noticed some warning, is it because newbies ain't allowed to send pm?There is nothing wrong with your PM. It's just a warning. You are free to send PMs unless the recipient disables them for newbie accounts, in which case, you will get a different message.
